keyEvents.title: Koby and Helmeppo Training
keyEvents.description: Koby and Helmeppo perform training duties including washing floors and other chores at Marine Headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the rigorous training environment for Marine recruits.

keyEvents.title: Garp Tests Trainees on the Beach
keyEvents.description: Garp takes Koby and Helmeppo to a beach at Marine Headquarters to test their resolve through combat.
keyEvents.significance: The beach becomes the site of their crucial test to become Garp's official trainees.

description: The main headquarters of the Marines, featuring a large multistory ancient Japanese-stylized palace building. Serves as the command center for Marine operations and houses training facilities for Marine recruits.

keyEvents.title: Rika's Reaction to Koby and Helmeppo's Departure
keyEvents.description: At the seafood restaurant in Shells Town, Rika learns that Koby and Helmeppo have left for Marine Headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the lasting impact the two Marines had on the town and its residents.

description: A town in East Blue that was formerly under the tyrannical rule of Captain Morgan. Home to Rika and her mother Ririka, who run a seafood restaurant.

name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

keyEvents.title: Nami Reads About Koby and Helmeppo
keyEvents.description: While the crew sleeps, Nami reads a newspaper article about Koby and Helmeppo's progress at Marine Headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that news of the Marines who befriended the Straw Hats is being publicized, and hints at Nami's concern about their growing notoriety.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. Currently sailing through the Grand Line toward Arabasta.
